mapper.select: SELECT c.company_code AS companyCode, c.company_id AS loginId, c.company_pw AS loginPw, c.site_resp AS siteResp, 'company' AS loginType FROM company c WHERE c.company_code = #{companyCode} AND c.company_id = #{userId}

SELECT e.company_code AS companyCode, e.employee_id AS loginId, e.employee_pw AS loginPw, e.employee_resp AS employeeResp, e.rank_name AS rankName, e.department_name AS departmentName, e.employee_name AS empName, 'employee' AS loginType FROM employees e WHERE e.company_code = #{companyCode} AND e.employee_id = #{userId}
